1318880.name: Fantasy Grounds - Remarkable Inns & Their Drinks
1318880.description:
Remarkable Inns & Their Drinks

Every story has a beginning, and more often than not they start in a tavern! Now you can turn boring tavern visits into memorable, exciting roleplaying events. Populate your world with taverns and NPC's your players are wanting to return to... for another drink!
Remarkable Inns & Their Drinks is the definitive guide to taverns, creating them and bringing them to life for your Fantasy Grounds campaign
This module includes:
  • 8 unique Inns, complete with their Remarkable special menus
  • A wealth of detail of information for bringing your Inn to life
  • A system for creating your own Inns, plus a pre-build Inn Generator so you can whip up an in on the fly for your players.
  • A conversion of a delightful 80-page book on famous taverns, featuring ready-made inns, special drinks, new gameplay rules over 1,000 options to create your own!
Compatible with any roleplaying system.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Lee Paxton
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
